H0.text: According to the Bible, who was renamed Israel because he wrestled with God. Abraham

H2.text: According to the Bible, who was renamed Israel because he wrestled with God. Esau

H3.text: According to the Bible, who was renamed Israel because he wrestled with God. Yacov

A4.text: Reading Genesis 32:29, 'Your name shall be called no more Jacob, but Israel,'
